attributes.action: Tenants Rent Payments must be included in credit score
attributes.additional_details: Tenants are unfairly treated when looking for a rental and their rental history of full payments is disregarded
attributes.background: To recognise tenants rental payments towards credit score

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Landlords are able to report rental income to credit agencies, who can then take this into account as part of their rental scores. It is a decision for landlords whether or not to do this.
